game.name: Robolucion: The Sandwich Conspiracy
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Robolucion: The Sandwich Conspiracy is a fast-paced first-person shooter set in a post-apocalyptic era, where mind-controlled “sheep” have taken over. Fight your way through hordes of brainwashed citizens, collect the mysterious purple serum, and uncover the truth behind the Sandwich Conspiracy.
